name: Ghost Quest [DEMO]
description:
Demo Release is FREE!

This is Ghost Quest.

Your mission is to gather as much information as we can about a person that passed away. While gathering clues, you have to watch out for the ghost in the house. It doesn't like visitors. Use the evidences to your advantage, write down everything you find, and RUN!
(Classified Ghost Hunting Company is not responsible for death or dismemberment.)

Controls:
  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move
  • Mouse to observe surroundings
  • Mouse Click and E to interact
  • F to flashlight
  • Z to bring up notes
  • X to bring up evidence paper

WARNING: Flashing lights and scary content! If you have any history of medical conditions (for example: photosensitivity), or even with no history of these conditions, if you experience any symptoms, immediately stop playing and contact a doctor!

Interested in the game? Consider clicking that "Add To Collection" button on the top right of the page!
